actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to relinquish and disclaim any title to certain lands and to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands situated in Yuma County, Ariz.

summary.text: Provides that the United States shall relinquish any claim and title to specified lands in Arizona. Directs and authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands in Yuma County, Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to relinquish and disclaim any title to certain lands and to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands situated in Yuma County, Ariz.
